news.title: Facebook's Express WiFi program now has an app on Google Play
news.description: Facebook has quietly launched its Express WiFi app on Google Play, and it's now available for download in Indonesia and Kenya. The application gives users a way to purchase internet connection from participating businesses instead of paying for a more expensi…
